General.Name: Padtec Holding S.A.
General.Description: IdeiasNet S.A. is a venture capital firm specializing in seed, startup, early stage, and growth capital transactions, and it also makes fund of fund investments in private equity funds. The firm seeks to invest in education technology and online education services, technology applied to healthcare with a focus on health services and healthcare, telecommunications, security, SaaS, e-commerce, contents, media, communications, cloud computing, software, mobile solutions and related technology sectors. It prefers to invest in the companies based in Brazil and Latin America, and seeks to invest between R$2 million ($0.89 million) and R$10 million ($4.43 million) in equity in companies with sales values between R$10 million ($4.93 million) and R$150 million ($73.97 million). The firm seeks to acquire both minority and majority stakes going from 10 per cent to 97 per cent. The firm prefers to take a seat on the board of directors of its portfolio companies. It makes balance sheet investments. IdeiasNet S.A. was founded on January 26, 1998 and is based in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.
General.Address: Rua Dr. Ricardo Benetton Martins N 1.000, Campinas, SP, Brazil, 13086-510
